      • pointCount

        public int pointCount​()

      • value

        public double value​(double[][][] fValues)
        Returns the value of the cluster for the given set of atom pairs at the given value of beta = 1/kT. It is expected that the pairs in the given PairSet will have all be reset (i.e., their r2 values already computed).
        Parameters:
        pairs - PairSet defining current configuration. Does not call reset for atom pairs, so this must be done before calling the method (accomplished by invoking pairs.resetPairs() method).
        beta - reciprocal temperature, 1/kT
        Returns:
        double value of the cluster

      • valueUsingPermutations

        protected double valueUsingPermutations​(double[][][] fValues)
        Returns value obtained by averaging over all unique permutations of the point indices.
        Parameters:
        fValues -
        Returns:
        double
